description.en: Like games such as Player Unknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG), Fortnite or Apex Legends? Play this free 2d battle royale io game in your browser!
description.ga_IE: Cosúil le cluichí cosúil le cadhglóra imreoir anaithnid (pubg), finscéalta Fortnite nó Apex?Seinn an cluiche seo saor in aisce 2D Royale IO Cluiche i do bhrabhsálaí!
